sourcesContent:
<template>
  <select @change="onFilter($event.target.value)">
    <option disabled selected>Filtrar por género</option>
    <option v-for="genre in genres" :key="genre.id" :value="genre.id">{{ genre.name }}</option>
  </select>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue'
const emit = defineEmits(['filter'])

const genres = ref([])

const fetchGenres = async () => {
  const res = await fetch(`https://api.themoviedb.org/3/genre/movie/list?api_key=${import.meta.env.VITE_TMDB_API_KEY}`)
  const data = await res.json()
  genres.value = data.genres
}

const onFilter = (genreId) => emit('filter', genreId)

onMounted(fetchGenres)
</script>
